name: Hero's Quest (itch)
description:
Made for the GMTK's Jame Gam 2019, this game exists with the idea of "how would it be an RPG where you can only attack one turn of the combat?"

This was my first game jam ever, and the game is buggy as all hell, but I'm happy with what I managed to make in only two days.

You only need the mouse to play.
Click to do the options and attack the enemies.
